name: College Nail Station
description:
Do you want to get remarkable nails like a princess?

College Nail Station! Make your nails much more beautiful!
It's a kids games for girls!

Then choose from loads of nail salon polish color collections to custom paint gorgeous nails. Let your inner nail artist out! Choose from absolutely tons of sparkling rhinestones, crystals, diamonds, gemstones, stickers, decals, hearts, flowers, fruit and much much more to decorate your nails. Once you are happy with your creations, save your nails to your album, or share!
